item.title: Getting Started with Org Roam - Build a Second Brain in Emacs
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Org-roam is a plain-text knowledge management system. Org-roam is a tool for networked thought. It reproduces some of Roam Researchâ€™s 1 key features within Org-mode. Org-roam borrows principles from the Zettelkasten method, providing a solution for non-hierarchical note-taking. It should also work as a plug-and-play solution for anyone already using Org-mode for their personal wiki. Org-roam provides these benefits over other tooling: Privacy and Security: Your personal wiki belongs only to you, entirely offline and in your control.
